-FocusReader - Advanced PDF Speed Reader
+# FocusReader - Advanced PDF Speed Reader
 
-FocusReader is a modern, React-based web application designed to improve reading speed and comprehension using RSVP (Rapid Serial Visual Presentation) and Guided Reading techniques.
+FocusReader is a modern, React-based web application designed to improve reading speed and comprehension using **RSVP** (Rapid Serial Visual Presentation) and **Guided Reading** techniques.
 
 It processes standard PDF files completely client-side, offering a distraction-free environment to consume content efficiently.
 
-ğŸŒŸ Features
+## ğŸŒŸ Features
 
-Dual Reading Modes:
+* **Dual Reading Modes:**
+    * **RSVP Mode:** Flashes words one by one in a fixed location to eliminate eye movement (saccades).
+    * **Original/Highlight Mode:** Renders the actual PDF layout and guides you with a moving yellow highlighter.
+* **PDF Parsing:** Built on top of `PDF.js` to render and extract text from documents securely within the browser.
+* **Customizable Controls:**
+    * Adjust Words Per Minute (WPM) from 100 to 1000+.
+    * Adjust Chunk Size (1-5 words at a time) for RSVP mode.
+    * Zoom controls for PDF view.
+* **Smart Auto-Scroll:** The PDF view automatically scrolls to keep the active line in the center of the viewport.
+* **Responsive Design:** Works beautifully on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
 
-RSVP Mode: Flashes words one by one in a fixed location to eliminate eye movement (saccades).
+## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack
 
-Original/Highlight Mode: Renders the actual PDF layout and guides you with a moving yellow highlighter.
+* **Frontend Framework:** React (Vite)
+* **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
+* **PDF Engine:** PDF.js (Mozilla)
+* **Icons:** Lucide React
+* **State Management:** React Hooks (Custom hooks architecture)
 
-PDF Parsing: Built on top of PDF.js to render and extract text from documents securely within the browser.

-

-Clone the repository:

@@ -0,0 +1,62 @@
+# **Flowsight â€” Advanced PDF Speed Reader**
+
+Flowsight is a modern, React-based web application built to improve reading speed and comprehension using **RSVP (Rapid Serial Visual Presentation)** and **Guided Reading techniques**.  
+It processes PDF files completely **client-side**, providing a distraction-free reading experience designed for speed and cognitive efficiency.
+
+---
+
+## ğŸŒŸ Features
+
+### ğŸš€ Dual Reading Modes
+- **RSVP Mode** â€“ Displays words one at a time in a fixed location to eliminate eye movement (saccades).
+- **Original / Highlight Mode** â€“ Renders the original PDF layout and guides reading with a moving word-level highlight.
+
+### ğŸ“„ PDF Parsing  
+Built on **PDF.js**, enabling secure in-browser PDF rendering and text extraction.
+
+### âš™ï¸ Customizable Controls
+- Adjustable **WPM (100â€“1000+)**
+- Configurable **word chunk size (1â€“5 words)** for RSVP mode
+- **Zoom controls** for PDF view
+
+### ğŸ” Smart Auto-Scroll  
+Automatically scrolls the PDF to keep the active line centered.
+
+### ğŸ“± Responsive Design  
+Optimized for desktop, tablets, and mobile devices.
+
+---
+
+## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack
+
+| Layer | Technology |
+|------|------------|
+| Frontend | React (Vite) |
+| Styling | Tailwind CSS |
+| PDF Engine | PDF.js |
+| Icons | Lucide React |
+| State Logic | React Hooks |
+
+---
+
+## ğŸš€ Getting Started
+
+### **Prerequisites**
+- Node.js (v16 or higher)
+- npm (comes with Node.js)
+
+### **Installation**
+```bash
+# Clone the repository
+git clone https://github.com/yourusername/flowsight.git
+cd flowsight
+
+# Install dependencies
+npm install
+
+# Fix Tailwind version mismatch (if any)
+npm install -D tailwindcss@3.4.17
+
+# Run the app
+npm run dev
+``
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,108 @@
+# **Flowsight â€” Advanced PDF Speed Reader**
+
+Flowsight is a modern, React-based web application built to improve reading speed and comprehension using **RSVP (Rapid Serial Visual Presentation)** and **Guided Reading techniques**.  
+It processes PDF files completely **client-side**, providing a distraction-free reading experience designed for speed and cognitive efficiency.
+
+---
+
+## ğŸŒŸ Features
+
+### ğŸš€ Dual Reading Modes
+- **RSVP Mode** â€“ Displays words one at a time in a fixed location to eliminate eye movement (saccades).
+- **Original / Highlight Mode** â€“ Renders the original PDF layout and guides reading with a moving word-level highlight.
+
+### ğŸ“„ PDF Parsing  
+Built on **PDF.js**, enabling secure in-browser PDF rendering and text extraction.
+
+### âš™ï¸ Customizable Controls
+- Adjustable **WPM (100â€“1000+)**
+- Configurable **word chunk size (1â€“5 words)** for RSVP mode
+- **Zoom controls** for PDF view
+
+### ğŸ” Smart Auto-Scroll  
+Automatically scrolls the PDF to keep the active line centered.
+
+### ğŸ“± Responsive Design  
+Optimized for desktop, tablets, and mobile devices.
+
+---
+
+## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack
+
+| Layer | Technology |
+|------|------------|
+| Frontend | React (Vite) |
+| Styling | Tailwind CSS |
+| PDF Engine | PDF.js |
+| Icons | Lucide React |
+| State Logic | React Hooks |
+
+---
+
+## ğŸš€ Getting Started
+
+### **Prerequisites**
+- Node.js (v16 or higher)
+- npm (comes with Node.js)
+
+### **Installation**
+```bash
+# Clone the repository
+git clone https://github.com/yourusername/flowsight.git
+cd flowsight
+
+# Install dependencies
+npm install
+
+# Fix Tailwind version mismatch (if any)
+npm install -D tailwindcss@3.4.17
+
+# Run the app
+npm run dev
+```
+## ğŸ“‚ Project Structure
+```text
+src/
+â”œâ”€â”€ components/         # UI Components
+â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ControlBar.jsx  # Play/Pause, Seek, WPM controls
+â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PDFDisplay.jsx  # Canvas rendering & Highlighter logic
+â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ RSVPDisplay.jsx # The center-screen flashing word box
+â”‚   â””â”€â”€ TopBar.jsx      # Navigation and Mode switching
+â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/              # Custom Logic Hooks
+â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ usePdfLoader.js # Handles PDF.js worker and text extraction
+â”‚   â””â”€â”€ useReaderEngine.js # Handles the timing and loop logic
+â””â”€â”€ App.jsx             # Main application entry
+
+```
+
+### ğŸ“– How to Use
+
+1. **Upload a PDF**
+   - Click **â€œSelect PDF Fileâ€**
+   - or **drag and drop** a file into the window
+
+2. **Select Reading Mode**
+   - âš¡ **Speed Mode** â†’ RSVP view (single/multiple words flashed)
+   - ğŸ“„ **Original Mode** â†’ PDF layout with guided word highlighting
+
+3. **Start Reading**
+   - Press the **Play** button to begin playback
+
+4. **Customize Settings**
+   - Adjust **Words Per Minute (WPM)**
+   - Set **chunk size (1â€“5 words at a time)**
+   - Change **zoom level** for PDF view
+
+
+

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
FocusReader - Advanced PDF Speed Reader

FocusReader is a modern, React-based web application designed to improve reading speed and comprehension using RSVP (Rapid Serial Visual Presentation) and Guided Reading techniques.

It processes standard PDF files completely client-side, offering a distraction-free environment to consume content efficiently.

ğŸŒŸ Features

Dual Reading Modes:

RSVP Mode: Flashes words one by one in a fixed location to eliminate eye movement (saccades).

Original/Highlight Mode: Renders the actual PDF layout and guides you with a moving yellow highlighter.

PDF Parsing: Built on top of PDF.js to render and extract text from documents securely within the browser.

Customizable Controls:

Adjust Words Per Minute (WPM) from 100 to 1000+.

Adjust Chunk Size (1-5 words at a time) for RSVP mode.

Zoom controls for PDF view.

Smart Auto-Scroll: The PDF view automatically scrolls to keep the active line in the center of the viewport.

Responsive Design: Works beautifully on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.

ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

Frontend Framework: React (Vite)

Styling: Tailwind CSS

PDF Engine: PDF.js (Mozilla)

Icons: Lucide React

State Management: React Hooks (Custom hooks architecture)

ğŸš€ Getting Started

Follow these steps to run the project locally on your machine.

Prerequisites

Node.js (v16 or higher)

npm (usually comes with Node.js)

Installation

Clone the repository:

git clone [https://github.com/yourusername/speed-reader.git](https://github.com/yourusername/speed-reader.git)
cd speed-reader


Install dependencies:

npm install


Note: If you encounter errors regarding tailwindcss or postcss, ensure you are using Tailwind v3 compatible with the config:
npm install -D tailwindcss@3.4.17

Run the development server:

npm run dev


Open your browser to the URL shown in the terminal (usually http://localhost:5173).

ğŸ“‚ Project Structure

src/
â”œâ”€â”€ components/         # UI Components
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ControlBar.jsx  # Play/Pause, Seek, WPM controls
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ PDFDisplay.jsx  # Canvas rendering & Highlighter logic
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ RSVPDisplay.jsx # The center-screen flashing word box
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ TopBar.jsx      # Navigation and Mode switching
â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/              # Custom Logic Hooks
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ usePdfLoader.js # Handles PDF.js worker and text extraction
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ useReaderEngine.js # Handles the timing and loop logic
â””â”€â”€ App.jsx             # Main application entry


ğŸ“– How to Use

Upload: Click the "Select PDF File" button or drag and drop a PDF into the window.

Choose Mode:

Click "Speed" (Lightning icon) for RSVP mode.

Click "Original" (Document icon) to read directly on the PDF.

Play: Press the large Play button or Spacebar (if implemented) to start.

Adjust: Use the settings (Gear icon) to change speed (WPM) or the number of words displayed at once.

ğŸ¤ Contributing

Contributions are welcome!

Fork the project.

Create your feature branch (git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature).

Commit your changes (git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature').

Push to the branch (git push origin feature/AmazingFeature).

Open a Pull Request.

ğŸ“„ License
